channel.title: ECR on Modernization workshop
channel.description: Recent content in ECR on Modernization workshop

item.title: DevSecOps Protection with Trend Micro - Cloud One
item.description: In this workshop, youâ€™ll learn how to leverage the Cloud One Platform to enforce the detection and protection in Applications, Elastic Kubernetes Service, Open-Source Projects and your IaC Templates!

item.title: Application Modernization with CircleCI
item.description: In this workshop you will learn why DevOps is a pattern for modernization and how to use patterns with CircleCI to release features and functionality at a faster pace.

item.title: Secure Devops with AWS & Sysdig
item.description: In this workshop, you will learn how to securely run cloud applications in production by automating AWS Fargate and ECR image scanning directly in your AWS environment. You will also learn how to improve the security of your cloud infrastructure using AWS CloudTrail and Sysdig CloudConnector.

item.title: DevSecOps with Atlassian & Snyk
item.description: In this workshop, you will learn patterns for shift-left security leveraging Atlassian Bitbucket, Bitbucket Pipelines, and Snyk.
